org.nzdis.micro

Class AgentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nzdis.micro.AgentController

  • public final class AgentController
extends java.lang.Object
    Publicly available agent controlling mechanism. This is to be used by the group owners to manipulate the state, capabilities and life cycle of underlying agents.

    AgentController.java
    Created: Mon Jul 23 12:57:08 2001
    Version:
    $Revision: 2.0 $ $Date: 2010/06/10 00:00:00 $
    Author:
    Mariusz Nowostawski (Original author), Christopher Frantz (Revision author)
    See Also:
    SystemAgentLoader, AgentLoader

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AgentController(AbstractAgent anAgent)
      Creates a new agent controller for a given agent.
